thread.title: Black Journalists Group Raises Concerns About NBC News Anchor’s Departure
thread.title_full: Black Journalists Group Raises Concerns About NBC News Anchor’s Departure - WSJ

author: Joe Flint
title: Black Journalists Group Raises Concerns About NBC News Anchor’s Departure

organizations.name: black journalists group raises concerns about nbc news anchor

text:
The departure of Tamron Hall and hiring of Megyn Kelly at NBC News has raised concerns with the National Association of Black Journalists.
Ms. Hall, a prominent personality on NBC’s popular morning show “Today” and its cable news channel, MSNBC, said this week that she was leaving the company when her contract ends this month.
A co-host with “Today” veteran Al Roker in the 9-10 a.m. hour of “Today,” Ms. Hall was seen as a...
